text:
@RichardDawkins @RichardDawkins I, a HKer graduated with an ecology major, greatly respected your academic works, but this honestly pissed me off.

We criticized WHO's inability in #coronavirus since Jan and adopted universal mask-wearing, now you ignorantly credit WHO with our own efforts?
